titleStmt.title: A familiar discourse or dialogue concerning the Mine-Adventure
titleStmt.author: Shiers, William.
Corporation of the Mine Adventurers of England. Second abstract of the state of the mines of Bwlehyr-Eskir-Hyr.

notesStmt.note: A defense of the Corporation of the Mine Adventurers of England.
Attributed to William Shiers. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
The second abstract of the state of the mines of Bwlchyr-Eskir-Hyr: 15 p. at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
